name: MovieMatchMaker
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie match maker
Developer Terms of Use
des: No prerequisites required. Simply download the skill and start watching movies! To start the skill, you can say something like "Alexa, start movie match maker" or "Alexa, ask movie match maker to find me a movie". Next, you need to tell the skill what movie genre(s) you are interested in watching. The skill will help you navigate the rest of its functionality. Pro tip: you can change the genre the skill looks for at any time just by saying the genre you want.
